snippet: One of the underlying themes of the Super Bowl was continuity; the Patriots and the Giants are exemplary as stable franchises. So is Pittsburgh, but perhaps that is about to change.
abstract: One of the underlying themes of the Super Bowl was continuity; the Patriots and the Giants are exemplary as stable franchises. So is Pittsburgh, but perhaps that is about to change.
lead_paragraph: One of the underlying themes of the Super Bowl was continuity.
